Description: Papyrus fragment bearing a three line Coptic text written along the fibres (recto). Mounted with EA 10129, 10140, 10455, 10456, 10458, 10461, 10462.
Curator's comments: Register says 'Found in some tombs in the hills behind Assiut'. Under study by Alain Delattre with a view to publication (updated March 2017).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380875) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380875)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Dr Gulian Lansing
